mapper.insert: insert into sys_params (PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, CONFIG_TYPE, MODIFY_FLAG, DESCRIPTION, PARAM_KEY, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF) values (#{paramId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyFlag,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update sys_params set PARAM_NAME = #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_VALUE = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIG_TYPE = #{configType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MODIFY_FLAG = #{modifyFlag,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_KEY = #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where PARAM_ID = #{paramId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, CONFIG_TYPE, MODIFY_FLAG, DESCRIPTION, PARAM_KEY, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_params where PARAM_ID = #{paramId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, CONFIG_TYPE, MODIFY_FLAG, DESCRIPTION, PARAM_KEY, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_params
and PARAM_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and PARAM_KEY = #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by CREATE_DATE desc

select PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, CONFIG_TYPE, MODIFY_FLAG, DESCRIPTION, PARAM_KEY, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_params where PARAM_KEY = #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PARAM_VALUE

select PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_VALUE, CONFIG_TYPE, MODIFY_FLAG, DESCRIPTION, PARAM_KEY, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_params where PARAM_KEY like concat(#{paramKey}, "%");
select PARAM_VALUE from sys_params where PARAM_KEY = #{paramKey};
